noargs:
Welcome to RPGBot's game! This is a text based role-playing game. You can play the game by sending me commands.

To get started, you will have to use the command:
*Register <your desired username>*

Here are the commands you can use:
*1. Commands* - Shows you a list of commands
*2. Show* - Shows you information about your character
*3. Fight* - Starts a fight
